it.unibz.gui
Class ProgressGui

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  it.unibz.gui.ProgressGui
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ProgressGui
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Our personalized progress bar, showed when our algorithms are executed. We need it because one of our datasets contains 30k+ tuples and there was a need to let the user know about the status of the operations.

See Also:
Serialized Form
